scripts.build: npm run browser-ws && npm run build-plain && npm run build-minified && npm rum types
scripts.build-plain: vite build && mv dist/plain/* dist/ && rmdir dist/plain
scripts.build-minified: vite build --mode minified && mv dist/minified/* dist/ && rmdir dist/minified
scripts.mk-src-global-dir: if [ ! -d src/global ]; then mkdir src/global; fi
scripts.browser-ws: npm run mk-src-global-dir && cp inc/GlobalWebSocket.browser.js src/global/WebSocket.js
scripts.node-ws: npm run mk-src-global-dir && cp inc/GlobalWebSocket.node.js src/global/WebSocket.js
scripts.prepack: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run start-ctn-api-emulator && npm run node-ws && mocha

enginesComments.node: IMPORTANT NOTE: to use with Node.js version 18.x, the --experimental-global-webcrypto flag needs to be set, which can be done via either the command line (e.g. node --experimental-global-webcrypto <script>) or the NODE_OPTIONS environment variable (e.g. NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-global-webcrypto')
